title: Event Recommendation Engine – Interest-Based Filtering for Personalized Suggestions
summary: As a developer, I want to integrate an event recommendation engine that filters suggestions based on user interests so that elderly users can easily find and engage in social activities that enhance their quality of life.

title: Shared Calendar Integration for Social Events
summary: As a developer, I want to create a shared calendar feature that allows elderly users to manage social events and communicate with caregivers, so that they can enhance social inclusion and maintain connections with family and friends.

title: Community Engagement Interface – Social Groups and Clubs Based on Shared Activities
summary: As a developer, I want to create an interface that allows elderly users to easily find and join social groups and clubs based on their interests, so that they can enhance their social connections and engagement.

title: Dynamic User Profiles for Personalized Engagement
summary: As a full-stack developer, I want to create dynamic user profiles that adapt to the preferences and needs of elderly users, so that I can enhance their engagement and provide a more tailored experience.
